short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension stores and translates selected words, phrases and sentences

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension is designed for quick words/text translation and ability to save words and phrases for the studing purposes. The dictionary is saved the original word (phrase), translation and context in which it was. Dictionary allows to edit an original word and its translation, as well as to emove it, if necessary. Dictionary allows you to put words in the ppropriate category to simplify further work. It allows you to sort by created date and filter by category and first letter. Categories can be themed with color and icon.
